marketing_description: The Essential Smart Saver plan offers cost-effective private hospital cover at 100% of the Discovery Health Rate, combined with a Medical Savings Account for day-to-day care. It excludes cover for certain expensive procedures like joint replacements.

notes: Premiums include Medical Savings Account portion.
We pay up to the Discovery Health Rate (100%).
Certain procedures regarding joints, spine, and hearing implants are not covered.

procedures.notes: Must be done in Smart Day Surgery Network. If done out of network, R12,650 upfront payment applies.
procedures.marketing_description: This procedure is fully covered (R0 co-payment) ONLY if performed in the Smart Day Surgery Network. Using a non-network facility will result in a substantial R12,650 upfront payment.

procedures.notes: Must be done in Smart Day Surgery Network. If done out of network, R12,650 upfront payment applies.
Upfront payment of R8,950 for hospital admissions (13+ years). R5,750 for day clinic admissions. Severe dental cover applies.

modules.title: Personal Health Fund
modules.description: Accumulate up to R6,000 per family for additional day-to-day cover.

data.mechanism: Health checks and physical activity goals unlock funds.

modules.title: Screening and Prevention
modules.description: Cover for screening tests like mammograms, pap smears, and prostate screening.

modules.title: Medical Savings Account
modules.description: 16% of your premium goes to a savings account for day-to-day expenses.
